#text=After touring the city , I arrived at the public bus stop and took a seat on the bench waiting for the bus to arrive .
#text=I looked at a map on what this bus 's route was , and it was heading towards where I needed to go .
#text=Since I am easily bored , I brought my MP3 player with me to listen to music .
#text=After a 10 minute wait the bus arrived and I got on with another person .
#text=As I walked up on the bus , I paid the fee that is required since I do n't have a bus pass .
#text=Since most people in the city like to keep to themselves , I left them alone and found an open seat on the bus in the back .
#text=After about 20 minutes on the bus , they finally arrived at my destination spot and I got off .
#text=After getting off the bus , I walked a couple more blocks over to where my hotel was .
